languages.text: {n}Встрепенувшись, Паскаль грозно произносит:{/n} "Фиксирую значимый языковой паттерн. Запрашиваю всю имеющуюся информацию об Ам... о Марнат".
{n}The name grabs Pasqal's attention. He says sternly,{/n} "I am registering a meaningful linguistic pattern. Requesting all available information on Am— on Marnat."
languages.original_text: {n}Встрепенувшись, Паскаль грозно произносит:{/n} "Фиксирую значимый языковой паттерн. Запрашиваю всю имеющуюся информацию об Ам... о Марнат".

languages.text: {n}その名がパスカルの注意を引く。厳格な声音で彼は言う。{/n}「有意の言語パターンを記録。アマ…マルナトに関する情報をすべて供出せよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The name grabs Pasqal's attention. He says sternly,{/n} "I am registering a meaningful linguistic pattern. Requesting all available information on Am— on Marnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}その名がパスカルの注意を引く。厳格な声音で彼は言う。{/n}「有意の言語パターンを記録。アマ…マルナトに関する情報をすべて供出せよ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}这个名字引起了帕斯卡的注意，他严肃地开了口。{/n}“检测到有效的语言信息模式。请求所有关于阿……关于玛纳特的信息。”
languages.original_text: {n}The name grabs Pasqal's attention. He says sternly,{/n} "I am registering a meaningful linguistic pattern. Requesting all available information on Am— on Marnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个名字引起了帕斯卡的注意，他严肃地开了口。{/n}“正在记录有效的语言信息模式。请求所有关于阿……关于玛纳特的信息。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}À l'évocation de ce nom, Pasqal intervient sèchement :{/n} « Schéma linguistique important détecté. Je requiers toutes les informations disponibles sur Am... sur Marnat. »
languages.original_text: {n}The name grabs Pasqal's attention. He says sternly,{/n} "I am registering a meaningful linguistic pattern. Requesting all available information on Am— on Marnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}À l'évocation de ce nom, Pasqal intervient sèchement :{/n} « Schéma linguistique important détecté. Je requiers toutes les informations disponibles sur Am... sur Marnat. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El nombre llama la atención de Pasqal, y dice, con voz severa:{/n} «Detecto un patrón lingüístico significativo. Solicitando toda la información disponible sobre Am... sobre Marnat».
languages.original_text: {n}The name grabs Pasqal's attention. He says sternly,{/n} "I am registering a meaningful linguistic pattern. Requesting all available information on Am— on Marnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}El nombre llama la atención de Pasqal, y dice, con voz severa:{/n} «Detecto un patrón lingüístico significativo. Solicitando toda la información disponible sobre Am... sobre Marnat».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Name weckt Pasqals Aufmerksamkeit. Er sagt streng:{/n} "Ich registriere ein bedeutsames linguistisches Muster. Erbitte sämtliche verfügbaren Informationen zu Am- zu Marnat."
languages.original_text: {n}The name grabs Pasqal's attention. He says sternly,{/n} "I am registering a meaningful linguistic pattern. Requesting all available information on Am— on Marnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Name weckt Pasqals Aufmerksamkeit. Er sagt streng:{/n} "Ich registriere ein bedeutsames linguistisches Muster. Erbitte sämtliche verfügbaren Informationen zu Am- zu Marnat."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}İsim, anında Pasqal'ın ilgisini çekiyor. Sert bir şekilde konuşuyor.{/n} "Anlamlı bir dil bilimsel kalıp kaydediyorum. Ama... Marnat'a dair tüm mevcut bilgi birikiminizi talep etmekteyim."
languages.original_text: {n}The name grabs Pasqal's attention. He says sternly,{/n} "I am registering a meaningful linguistic pattern. Requesting all available information on Am— on Marnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}İsim Pasqal'ın anında ilgisini çekiyor. Sert bir şekilde konuşuyor:{/n} "Anlamlı bir dilbilimsel kalıp kaydediyorum. Amar... Marnat hakkındaki tüm mevcut bilgilerinizi talep etmekteyim."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
